author: Aris Folley
title: Florida sheriff asks for new leads in disappearance of Carole Baskin's former husband after Netflix's 'Tiger King' drops
description: A sheriff from Hillsborough County, Florida, is asking the public for leads into the 1997 disappearance of millionaire Don Lewis, the former husband of Carole Baskin, after the popular "Tiger King" docuseries on Netflix p...
content: A sheriff from Hillsborough County, Florida, is asking the public for leads into the 1997 disappearance of millionaire Don Lewis, the former husband of Carole Baskin, after the popular Tiger King docuseries on Netflix prompted questions online about the cold … [+3667 chars]
